lead_paragraph: Chinalco, China’s top aluminum maker, is under increasing pressure to reorganize its $19.5 billion deal with the heavily indebted Australian mining company Rio Tinto. A revision of the terms is almost inevitable, and Rio has everything to play for, Breakingviews says.
